trunk.title: Friday night
trunk.description: Friday night presents exciting options for AT. Maybe there's a chance to feel like he belongs tonight.

branch.title: Party at Jay Jay's
branch.description: Jay Jay has invited AT to chill at his house tonight. It's definitely not something Auntie Gina would approve of, but it's a great chance to make some new friends and have some fun.

defaultResult.title: Party time
defaultResult.description: AT heads to Jay Jay's house

branch.title: Stay home
branch.description: AT decides tonight is not the night for a party.

trunk.title: Jay Jay offers AT a beer
trunk.description: Jay Jay sees that AT is having a hard time relaxing, so he opens a beer and holds it out for AT to grab.

branch.title: Accept the beer
branch.description: AT takes the beer and start drinking. It's cold and refreshing, and more importantly helps AT feel more at ease.

branch.title: Refuse the beer
branch.description: AT is not comfortable with drinking tonight. Maybe it's the pressure of the situation, his discomfort with underage drinking, or something else.

defaultResult.title: Peer pressure
defaultResult.description: AT turns down the beer, but Jay Jay insists heavily that it will be a good decision. Afraid to say no again, AT caves and accepts the beer.

successResult.title: Peer pressure
successResult.description: AT turns down the beer, but Jay Jay insists heavily that it will be a good decision. AT knows what he wants though, and he will need fall to the pressure. He successfuly turns down the offer!

branch.title: Ask a friend
branch.description: AT looks to Jimmy for support. Is he drinking?
